Class TextAreaSkin.ElementView

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.pivot.wtk.skin.TextAreaSkin.NodeView
      org.apache.pivot.wtk.skin.TextAreaSkin.ElementView
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
TextAreaSkin.DocumentView, TextAreaSkin.ParagraphView
Enclosing class:
TextAreaSkin
public abstract class TextAreaSkin.ElementView
extends TextAreaSkin.NodeView
implements Sequence<TextAreaSkin.NodeView>, Iterable<TextAreaSkin.NodeView>, ElementListener

Abstract base class for element views.
